snippet: Joel J. Seidemann, a senior Manhattan prosecutor who handled the fraud trial of Brooke Astor’s son, will pick up the case against Pedro Hernandez in the murder of 6-year-old Etan Patz.
abstract: Joel J Seidemann, senior Manhattan prosecutor who oversaw fraud trial of Anthony D Marshall, has been assigned task of retrying Pedro Hernandez on charges of murdering 6-year-old Etan Patz in 1979.
lead_paragraph: Joel J. Seidemann, a senior Manhattan prosecutor who handled the fraud trial of Brooke Astor’s son, will pick up the case against Pedro Hernandez in the murder of 6-year-old Etan Patz.

headline.main: New Prosecutor Is Selected for Patz Retrial
headline.print_headline: New Prosecutor Is Selected for Patz Retrial
